mapper.select: select xq,Open.kh,km,sksj from Open,Course_ where Open.kh=Course_.kh and gh=#{gh}
select * from Open where kh = #{kh} and gh=#{gh} and xq=#{xq}
SELECT xh,name,pscj,kscj,zpcj FROM Elective,user WHERE kh=#{kh} and xq=#{xq} and gh=#{gh} and xh=userId
mapper.insert: insert into Open(xq, kh, gh, sksj) values(#{xq},#{kh},#{gh},#{sksj})
mapper.select: select OC.kh,OC.km,OC.gh,U.name as tname,OC.sksj,OC.xq from (select Open.kh,Course_.km,Open.gh,Open.sksj,Open.xq from Open left join Course_ on Open.kh=Course_.kh where Course_.km LIKE #{km}) as OC left join (select userId,name from user) as U on OC.gh=U.userId
